featured.text: They are brave enough to help in an emergency while others may stand by.
Brave deeds can take many different forms.
What is the main idea of the passage? (A) William Hunter was a very brave boy. (B) Hunter saved Carnegie from drowning.
The townspeople built a _____ in memory of the brave teacher who sacrificed her life to save her students from a burning bus.

other.text: Whoever dropped the shoe must have been a brave and determined woman.
Sometimes heroes are rewarded for their brave acts.

definition.zh_def: 勇敢的，無畏的，面對困難或危險時表現出的勇氣。
definition.en_def: Having or showing courage; ready to face and endure danger or pain.
definition.example: The brave firefighter rescued the cat from the burning building.
